heading: HB08306
0: AN ACT RECLASSIFYING THE SALARY AND QUALIFICATIONS OF CERTAIN EMPLOYEES IN THE JUDICIARY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2018-10-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08306
FULL TITLE : AN ACT RECLASSIFYING THE SALARY AND QUALIFICATIONS OF CERTAIN EMPLOYEES IN THE JUDICIARY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to reclassify and increase the salaries of 18 positions in the Judiciary which shall be commensurate to their merits, qualifications and amount of works that they perform. States that increasing the salaries of these court personnel will enable them to focus on their work and contribute in the speedy and efficient administration of justice in the country.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SALO, RON P.
DATE FILED : 2018-09-27
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Hernandez (P.) (000 2018-12-18)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS ON 2018-10-02
